title: לעבוד בהיי-טק: 10 משרות חדשות ומומלצות
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

קרדיט תמונה: Getty Images Israel
אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
גיקטיים הוא אתר הטכנולוגיה המוביל והגדול בישראל וזאת גם הסיבה שכל החברות הגדולות בתחום עובדות איתנו.
אם אתם אוהבים להפיק אירועים, לתת שירות ולעבוד עם אנשים לפחות כמו שאתם מכורים לטכנולוגיה, אם אתם תקתקנים, סוגרי קצוות, אנרגטיים ונעימים ואם אתם רוצים להיות בחזית של כל מה שקורה בעולם הטכנולוגיה, זה המקום בשבילכם.
התפקיד כולל אחריות מלאה על תפעול והפקת אירועי הטכנולוגיה הגדולים של גיקטיים, מא’ ועד ת’. כמו כן, התפקיד כולל עבודה אדמינסטרטיבית הקשורה לתפועל המשרד, ניהול יומנים, פגישות, PA, עבודת Back Office, תמיכה בצוות המכירות ודאגה לרווחת העובדים
דרישות:
– ניסיון של שנה לפחות בהפקת אירועים – יתרון משמעותי.
– ניסיון אדמינסטרטיבי – יתרון.
– תקתקנות, יחסי אנוש מעולים.
– יצירתיים וקריאטיביים.
– יכולת עבודה בצוות.
– חיים ונושמים טכנולוגיה.
– זמינות למשרה מלאה במשרדינו ברמת החייל.
To send a CV for the position of מנהל/ת הפקה ואדמינסטרציה – Geektime
Our people meet extraordinary challenges every day, overcome them and influence the shaping of an innovative, highly sophisticated product that will change the way the security industry will look tomorrow.
We are a company that sees its people and knows that they are the key to our success. Our people are leaders in their domain and we continue to have the best talent join our amazing journey. At SentinelOne we work as one, thinking, brainstorming, while giving each person his domain and autonomy. We are an organization that truly values its people.
Requirements:
– 5+ years’ experience working in Production environment.
– Strong background in Linux Administration and IT in general.
– Proven experience working with cloud service providers (AWS is required, Azure is advantage).
– Experience with automation/configuration management systems (preferably ansible).
– Fluent with python as a scripting/programming language.
– Experience with continues integration systems (e.g. Jenkins).
– Experience in designing and implementing monitoring solutions.
– Ability to use a wide variety of different technologies and tools for managing and maintaining production environment.
– Experience with VMWare is an advantage.
To send a CV for the position of IT Production Sr. Engineer / DevOps Engineer – SentinelOne

We are looking for a hands-on Software Architecture Engineer for the development of advanced projects for GMs autonomous car.
The Software Architecture Engineer will be Responsible for Define embedded software requirements at system levels (HWSW) as well as interactions among the system and subsystems from feature definitions and higher level requirements.
Provide technical leadership and decision making for the product software development teams and provide overall conceptual and functional design of software.
Algorithm implementation for environment and situation awareness using multi-sensor.
Requirements:
– BSc MSc degree in Electrical eng, Computer, Mathematics, or a related field of study.
– Over 8 years in software design, methodologies, and architecture of large and complex software systems.
– Over 5 years of experience in multi-threaded software application using C, C++ Expertise in programming languages (C / C++, Python, OpenGL, etc.).
– Expertise in embedded RT operating systems (ROS, embedded Linux, GHS Integrity, VxWorks, etc.) and in embedded development environment (Cuda, OpenCL, etc.).
– Expertise in software optimization (in prototype and embedded target environment).
– Expertise in multiple operating systems such as Windows, Linux, etc..
– Ability to understand and implement complex algorithms efficiently and correctly.
– Excellent communication skills and a proven ability to multitask and deliver on challenging software development tasks.
To send a CV for the position of Software Architecture Engineer – General Motors – ג’נרל מוטורס

The Senior Business Analyst at Brightcom is responsible to mine and evaluate data and translate key findings into meaningful information that is used to construct and influence marketing strategies.
– Solve complex business & marketing problems, using data and analysis.
– Develop and present clear concise recommendations outlining alternatives and key decision criteria.
– Identify patterns and gaps in the BI models and communicate the requirements to the development teams.
– Generating reports tracking the performance of campaigns and product launches.
– Creating ad hoc reports measuring the performance of strategic initiatives.
– Implement BI tools in organization, train employees and ensure adoption.
– Interact and influence at all levels of the organization.
– Design complex reports and dashboards.
Requirements:
– Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in Economics, Finance, Operations Research, Statistics or other quantitative field.
– 2-5 years of experience in marketing analytics, database marketing, strategic consulting, investment banking, or private equity.
– Demonstrated experience working in a team environment with experience communicating with senior leaders.
– Proven track record of defining and executing key analyses with minimal supervision.
– Expert level knowledge of Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint programming languages such as Visual Basic – advantage.
– Demonstrated experience in modeling, analysis, research and presentation creation.
– Proficiency with and/or strong desire to learn SQL.
– Fast learner, able to acquire new technical skills as needed.
– Strong written and oral communication skills.
– Experience in the Online advertising industry –advantage.

In this position, you will be a member of an elite security evaluation team covering a wide range of Intel state of the art products (FW and SW) that developed in Jerusalem Design Center.
Your responsibilities will include but not be limited to:
– Identifying vulnerabilities during all phases of the product development cycle (architecture, design, implementation and pen testing)
– Devising and implementing creative ways to attack these vulnerabilities and drive for resolution
Requirements:
– Security expert with a minimum of 2 years’ experience in security product development/design (smart card, OTP, TPM, security protocols etc.) or security assurance including at least 2 of the following: (1) design review, (2) code review or (3) penetration testing.
– B.SC or M.SC in Computer Science / Software Engineering / Computer Engineering.
– Experience with embedded SW, C/C++/Java, secure coding, fuzzing, exploitation knowledge, crypto.
– In-depth knowledge of security and networking standards.
– Fluent English.
– Advantage will be given to those with experience in: Perl/Python, Windows/Linux/Android internals, static code analysis, reverse engineering.
